amendment.description: Page 39, line 1, insert ", including force protection and in extremis support" after "logistical support".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 110-174 to specifies that logistical support activities for counter narcotics missions in Afghanistan include force protection and in extremis support.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Souder amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Souder.
